title: getBiomesByEA
name: getBiomesByEA
description:
Find all biomes that belong to the given environmental authority.

Some of the response properties are TopoJson / GeoJson standard properties, so they are not described here.

title: createProjectStrategy
name: createProjectStrategy
description: Create a new strategy as part of the selected strategies of the given project

body.description: environmental authority to associate with the strategy
'subzona hidrográfica' to associate with the strategy

Success 200.description: environmental authority to associate with the strategy
'subzona hidrográfica' to associate with the strategy

groupDescription: Queries and actions directly related with projects strategies selected inside a project

title: downloadSelectedStrategies
name: downloadSelectedStrategies
description: Generate a GeoJson file that includes all selected strategies information for a given project

Success 200.description: GeoJson file with selected strategies as features

groupDescription: Queries and actions directly related with projects strategies selected inside a project

title: listProjectStrategies
name: listProjectStrategies
description: List all saved (selected) strategies associated with the given project

groupDescription: Queries and actions directly related with projects strategies selected inside a project

title: addImpactedBiomes
name: addImpactedBiomes
description: Associate a set of biomes as impacted by a given project. This automatically updates the associated project total area

body.description: array of biomes to associate with the project
percentage that represents this biome in the total project area

Success 200.description: array of biomes to associate with the project
percentage that represents this biome in the total project area
indicates if the biome was associated to the project through the platform (false) or by other way

title: listProjectsByCompany
name: listProjectsByCompany
description: Find all projects that belongs to a given company. If group_props is passed, results will be grouped by the first prop, then by the second, so on.

Parameter.description: list of properties to group results by

title: BiomeBySubzone
name: BiomeBySubzone
description: Separate a selected biome total area in the given environmental authority by sub-basins
groupDescription: Geofences endpoints: Given some kind of geofence, such as environmental authority, get its area divided by some criterion, such as compensation factor, biomes or biotic units

title: EAByBioticUnit
name: EAByBioticUnit
description: Separate the environmental authority total area by biotic units

Success 200.description: total area for the associated biotic unit

groupDescription: Geofences endpoints: Given some kind of geofence, such as environmental authority, get its area divided by some criterion, such as compensation factor, biomes or biotic units

title: EAByCompensationFactor
name: EAByCompensationFactor
description: Separate the environmental authority total area by compensation factor

Success 200.description: total area for the associated compensation factor

groupDescription: Geofences endpoints: Given some kind of geofence, such as environmental authority, get its area divided by some criterion, such as compensation factor, biomes or biotic units

title: EAByGeneralBiome
name: EAByGeneralBiome
description: Separate the environmental authority total area by general biome (different from IAvH biomes).
groupDescription: Geofences endpoints: Given some kind of geofence, such as environmental authority, get its area divided by some criterion, such as compensation factor, biomes or biotic units

title: listStrategiesByBiomeSubzoneEA
name: listStrategiesByBiomeSubzoneEA
description:
List all strategies filtered by biome, sub-basin and environmental authority. They are grouped by strategy type (id)

Some of the response properties are GeoJson standard properties, so they are not described here.

examples.title: Request-Example:

title: loginUser
name: loginUser
description: Authenticate a user. Properties of the returned object varies, since these are defined in the configuration file, but it includes at least username.
